description: 「スモールビジネスを世界の主役に。」をミッションに掲げ会計・人事労務・販売・申告など統合型経営プラットフォームを提供。ヒト・モノ・カネを網羅しあらゆる業務とデータを繋げて自動化と可視化を実現。2024年にはメニューバーデザイン共通化や事業計画機能を追加。アクセシビリティへのこだわりとUX/UIデザインに定評があり従業員1700名超の組織に成長。
description_en: Mission: "Empower small businesses to become the heroes of the world." Provides integrated business management platform covering accounting, HR, sales, and tax filing. Connects all operations and data across people, goods, and money to enable automation and visualization. Added unified menu bar design and business planning features in 2024. Renowned for commitment to accessibility and UX/UI design, grown to over 1,700 employees.
